    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    protected QuicConnectionIdGenerator
    QuicCodecDispatcher.newIdGenerator(int idx)
    Returns a QuicConnectionIdGenerator that will encode the given index into all the ids that it produces.
    static QuicConnectionIdGenerator
    QuicConnectionIdGenerator.randomGenerator()
    Return a QuicConnectionIdGenerator which randomly generates new connection ids.
    static QuicConnectionIdGenerator
    QuicConnectionIdGenerator.signGenerator()
    Return a QuicConnectionIdGenerator which generates new connection ids by signing the given input.
